parameters.name: FullRelease
parameters.description: Specifies whether to fully release the version. This parameter takes effect only when PublishType is set to region.

parameters.name: Percentage
parameters.description: The release percentage. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 100.

parameters.name: PublishEnv
parameters.description:
The environment to which you want to release the version. Valid values:

*   prod: the production environment.
*   staging: the staging environment.

parameters.name: PublishType
parameters.description:
Specifies how the version is released. Valid values:

*   percentage: releases the version by percentage.
*   region: releases the version by region.

If you do not specify this parameter, the version is released by percentage by default.

parameters.name: Regions
parameters.description: The regions to which the version is released.

parameters.name: Remarks
parameters.description: The remarks. This parameter is empty by default.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The time when the application version starts to be released. If you do not specify this parameter, the current time is used by default.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.
